solution_line_template: First find Bill's height by dividing Cary's height by {half_divisor}: {cary_height} inches / {half_divisor} = <<{cary_height}/{half_divisor}={bill_height}>>{bill_height} inches
Then add {jan_taller_amount} inches to find Jan's height: {bill_height} inches + {jan_taller_amount} inches = <<{bill_height}+{jan_taller_amount}={jan_height}>>{jan_height} inches
